CustomField.description: When checked, the Platform Event dynamic subscription will be executed within the same process as the trigger. When unchecked, the subscribed object will be executed as a Queueable.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, the Platform Event dynamic subscription will be executed within the same process as the trigger. When unchecked, the subscribed object will be executed as a Queueable.
CustomField.label: Run In Process
